duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead engagement and recognition activities for all store Associates.
Support Store Leadership with identifying performance opportunities, prepares Managers to conduct performance conversations, and follows up throughout the performance process.
Recruits non-exempt candidates for open positions and assists Managers, as well as Candidates, throughout the selection process.
Updates Associate information in People Service systems.
Responds to employee benefits questions and leads the annual benefits renewal and open enrollment process, as applicable.

education_certification.credential: 1-3 years of relevant People Services experience
